Name: Eetcafé 't Gasthuys
Review Text: Tasty food, nice ambience, staff very polite and helpful but service can be faster

Name: Eetcafé 't Gasthuys
Review Text: A very traditional Dutch bar/restaurant in the center of Amsterdam. The style is very nice with two floors of space to sit. Staff was very happy and polite! I ordered ribs for dinner and I was very happy with the quantity and quality of the …

Name: Eetcafé 't Gasthuys
Review Text:
Great place to stop for a drink and lunch! Nice ambience with outside seating.
A little understaffed but otherwise the service was good.
Both, the burger and 3 spicy sausage Italian roll were pretty good. Would recommend this place for a stop while youre strolling through the city!

Name: Eetcafé 't Gasthuys
Review Text: Great owners and atmosphere, drinks were reasonably priced as well

Name: Eetcafé 't Gasthuys
Review Text: Very friendly staffs, very good food. They have 3 course menu offer for 14,75. Totally worth it. Super satisfied!

Name: Eetcafé 't Gasthuys
Review Text: Very nice place, you have feeling like you are at home. Excelent  food.

Name: Eetcafé 't Gasthuys
Review Text: Reasonable prices. Nice old style bar. Well worth a visit.

Name: Eetcafé 't Gasthuys
Review Text: Nice quite place. Good burgers, salads, kebabs and coffee.

Name: Eetcafé 't Gasthuys
Review Text: Finaly found a cafe with good beers. It is nice to drink and see boats

Name: Eetcafé 't Gasthuys
Review Text: Really good place to relax and have a beer on the side of a canal!

Name: Eetcafé 't Gasthuys
Review Text: Great service, food, price and scenery! Would highly recommended. Especially the steak.

Name: Eetcafé 't Gasthuys
Review Text: Great place to hang out, friendly service, cool atmosphere.

Name: Eetcafé 't Gasthuys
Review Text: Great food experience, but extremely slow service. The chicken kebab was delicious!

Name: Eetcafé 't Gasthuys
Review Text: The service was great. The food was delicious and it lived up to the price. The drinks menu was plentiful.

Name: Eetcafé 't Gasthuys
Review Text: Small and cozy place with a good menu and freshly prepared food. Nice place to hangout with friends and locals.

Name: Eetcafé 't Gasthuys
Review Text: Menu says fries are included, our food arrived without them, and the waiter told us that it does not work that way and we will not be getting fries

Name: Eetcafé 't Gasthuys
Review Text: Found this place by accident, lovely place to have a drink & to eat(food was very reasonable and very delicious) service was excellent! Great guys behind the bar. One was Leon and i did not get the name of the other gentleman behind the bar.I would definitely recommend this place. I will be back!

Name: Eetcafé 't Gasthuys
Review Text: Nice bar but terrible service. We ordered the fish and both servings had bones all through the fillets. After waiting for 10 minutes for service, watching the male waiter on his phone behind the bar coming out twice to check every table …

Name: Eetcafé 't Gasthuys
Review Text: Very nice service in a nice café with possibility to sit outside above a canal. Coffee was good and the waiter friendly.

Name: Eetcafé 't Gasthuys
Review Text: You can get 3 course set menu for 14.95eur, what is really good price, considered of the location, which is very central, there is inside and outside seating. Outside is quite nice, by the canal. Food is good and quite fresh, I was …

Name: Eetcafé 't Gasthuys
Review Text: Food and drinks were delicious! Came here with my girlfriend and had wonderful 3 course meal with a few beers and the staff were incredibly friendly! Cheapest and the nicest bar we've come across in Amsterdam.

Name: Eetcafé 't Gasthuys
Review Text: Really enjoyed our visit. We ordered the deal of the day at just under 10euros which was steak cheese in a bun, chips and salad and bottle of house wine at 11. Serves was good and lots of atmosphere.

Name: Eetcafé 't Gasthuys
Review Text: Lovely little Restaurant. Good prices for real good food and drinks. Waiter is a real star! <3 you don't have to hurry or need to pay after you finished your food and ordered another drink. Also real nice possibilities to sit outside :-)

Name: Eetcafé 't Gasthuys
Review Text: Amazing place. Stumbled across this place on a rainy day in Amsterdam and fell completely in love. Very friendly staff, good food, Great beer. Stayed all afternoon to early evening. Wi-Fi available so we streamed the game. Went  back the next before we had to go to the airport. Highly recommend. The best seat is the one in the window.

Name: Eetcafé 't Gasthuys
Review Text: Friendly stuff, yum cocktails and pints!

Name: Eetcafé 't Gasthuys
Review Text: One of the most value for money restaurants in the city. Probably the best burger regarding the taste and the size. The personnel is also very friendly, which is remarkable as it is always very busy and they are stil so helpful. Absolutely …

Name: Eetcafé 't Gasthuys
Review Text: Really Good burger, great selection of beers.

Name: Eetcafé 't Gasthuys
Review Text: Went with a stag do, ended up going in for the following 2 days thereafter. So friendly so good a dealing with a bunch of drunken Englishmen despite our good manners. So go here agin when we're next over! See you soon Kasper.

Name: Eetcafé 't Gasthuys
Review Text: Really cozy little café. Inexpensive for the centre of Amsterdam. Close to several fine theatres and cafés. Nice if you want to find a more quiet spot. Try their delicious hot apple pie!

Name: Eetcafé 't Gasthuys
Review Text: To be honest in the beginning I thought it's a tourist trap but I would say in the end it was a lovely experience, it's a casual restaurant with a lovely terrace overlooking the canals of Amsterdam, service was casual but friendly food …

Name: Eetcafé 't Gasthuys
Review Text: That place is perfect! Friendly staff, good jazz music, and delicious food. We’re vegetarian and Spanish people and for the both are perfect, and good price too ☺️

Name: Eetcafé 't Gasthuys
Review Text: Brilliant bar. We found this place back in March and now again in November. Love how cosy this place is. Very dutch! Reasonable price and also good food. Friendly staff.... Worth a visit when in Amsterdam.

Name: Eetcafé 't Gasthuys
Review Text: Lovely and cosy atmosphere! Good bakery, but I missed the essence of the food. It's good, but needs that something more...

Name: Eetcafé 't Gasthuys
Review Text: Good price, good (and plenty of) food, good atmosphere. My wife and I randomly walked into it and we were pleasantly surprised by how good it is.

Name: Eetcafé 't Gasthuys
Review Text: For the price paid, it's decent value. The butter fish wasn't great in texture but I loved the starter with cheese croquettes. The atmosphere is cosy.

Name: Eetcafé 't Gasthuys
Review Text: Wonderful Belgian beer on tap, amazing pork satay, lovely quiet atmosphere. Space upstairs and fun times watching people navigate the snappy doors.

Name: Eetcafé 't Gasthuys
Review Text: Food looks good and seems well priced. Beer is cheap and ambiance is fun and relaxed. Great non-tourist trap spot!

Name: Eetcafé 't Gasthuys
Review Text: Simple but tasty food in a beautiful setting. You can sit outside beside the canal or inside - has a great old pub feel.

Name: Eetcafé 't Gasthuys
Review Text: Had a great time here... Perfectly managed a group of 25 people serving perfect Burgers and a bigger couple of drinks. Will definitely come back!

Name: Eetcafé 't Gasthuys
Review Text:
Good vibe, quick service and good fast food.

Good place to have a quick lunch and a fresh beer outside with summery weather. …

Name: Eetcafé 't Gasthuys
Review Text: A lovely old-fashioned bar restaurant by the canalside.  Good beer and food. Lovely barmaid but the world's most miserable waitress.

Name: Eetcafé 't Gasthuys
Review Text: We came for lunch and ordered a Cesar salad and a club sandwich. Both had some very dry chicken and all over quite unimpressive.

Name: Eetcafé 't Gasthuys
Review Text: Really good place with tasty food, good drinks and friendly staff!  So cosy and comfortable!  We were impressed

Name: Eetcafé 't Gasthuys
Review Text: Nice quiet spot in the sun with a small canal to stare the day away. Awesome bitterballen, steak & cheeseburger. Sign outside saying NO SAXOPHONE! Altho I guess it means no street music...

Name: Eetcafé 't Gasthuys
Review Text: Tasty food and a good view

Name: Eetcafé 't Gasthuys
Review Text: Very nice place, tasty food, friendly staff, huge portions!!!

Name: Eetcafé 't Gasthuys
Review Text: A friendly little restaurant very close to the touristy places but it's much more quiet and nice.

Name: Eetcafé 't Gasthuys
Review Text: very popular bar with a variety of beers. Enjoyed the 3 course dinner for just over €14

Name: Eetcafé 't Gasthuys
Review Text: If you read this, go inside and order your food!!! That is an order! Awesome staff!  The Dutch can read minds. He knew my draft was empty!!!

Name: Eetcafé 't Gasthuys
Review Text: So the translation from Dutch "cafe t Gasthuys" to English is also "cafe t Gasthuys"?! Wow I'm so happy they published their name twice! Nah I don't think I will come here

Name: Eetcafé 't Gasthuys
Review Text: We had to wait way too long until the waiter came. Unfortunately he has no clue of what is being offered here. Questions were answered really offensively and impolitly.

Name: Eetcafé 't Gasthuys
Review Text: Amazing, vibrant, realaxing atmosphere, excellent food and service.. plus very cheap considering it location to dam square

Name: Eetcafé 't Gasthuys
Review Text: Great location, friendly staff and excellent food. Superb value for money and highly recommended.

Name: Eetcafé 't Gasthuys
Review Text: Great selection, great value, friendly welcoming staff, with good music too. Couldn't ask for more in a bar!

Name: Eetcafé 't Gasthuys
